text: The Stickup is a 2002 American crime thriller film written and directed by Rowdy Herrington and starring James Spader. It was rated R for language and violence. ==Premise== A thief wearing a clown mask robs a bank of half a million dollars in a quiet little town then holes up with the ex-wife of one of the policemen hunting him. ==Cast and characters== *James Spader as John Parker *Leslie Stefanson as Natalie Wright *David Keith as Ray DeCarlo *John Livingston as FBI Agent Rick Kendall *Robert Miano as Lt. Vincent Marino *Alf Humphreys as Mike O'Grady *Tim Henry as Arlen Morris *Mark Holden as Roy Freeman *Scott Heindl as Steve Spizak *Alex Zahara as Tommy Meeker *Alvin Sanders as Harris *Cindy Maines as Female Teller *Karin Konoval as Dr. Alvarez *Christina Jastrzembska as Farm Woman *Chief Leonard George as Chief Samson Redcloud ==References== ==External links== * Category:2002 films Category:2002 action thriller films Category:2002 crime thriller films Category:American action thriller films Category:American films Category:American crime thriller films
title: The Stickup
